_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.[ABOUT]: [Examples of MessageFormat v2 syntax for gender/plural awareness. Copy these into your main i18n files!]
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.ITEMS_COUNT: {count, plural, =0{No items} one{# item} other{# items}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.DAYS_LEFT: {days, plural, =0{Expired today} one{# day left} other{# days left}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.FILES_SELECTED: {count, plural, =0{No files selected} one{# file selected} other{# files selected}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.USERS_ONLINE: {count, plural, =0{Nobody online} one{# user online} other{# users online}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.USER_GREETING: {gender, select, male{Welcome, Mr. {name}!} female{Welcome, Ms. {name}!} other{Welcome, {name}!}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.ROLE_ASSIGNED: {gender, select, male{He was assigned as {role}} female{She was assigned as {role}} other{They were assigned as {role}}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.PROFILE_UPDATED: {gender, select, male{His profile was updated} female{Her profile was updated} other{Their profile was updated}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.FRIEND_REQUESTS: {gender, select, male{He sent you} female{She sent you} other{They sent you}} {count, plural, =0{no requests} one{# friend request} other{# friend requests}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.FILES_UPLOADED: {gender, select, male{He uploaded} female{She uploaded} other{They uploaded}} {count, plural, =0{no files} one{# file} other{# files}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.MESSAGES_RECEIVED: {gender, select, male{He sent} female{She sent} other{They sent}} {count, plural, =0{no messages} one{# message} other{# messages}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.TASK_CREATED: {gender, select, male{He {{BASE.ACTIONS.CREATE}}d this task} female{She {{BASE.ACTIONS.CREATE}}d this task} other{They {{BASE.ACTIONS.CREATE}}d this task}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.TASK_DELETED: {gender, select, male{He {{BASE.ACTIONS.DELETE}}d} female{She {{BASE.ACTIONS.DELETE}}d} other{They {{BASE.ACTIONS.DELETE}}d}} {count, plural, one{# task} other{# tasks}}
_MESSAGEFORMAT_EXAMPLES.ACCOUNT_STATUS: Your {{BASE.ACCOUNTS.SINGULAR}} has {count, plural, =0{no pending items} one{# pending item} other{# pending items}}
